scripts.test: nodemon -w tests -w src -e .py -x cross-env LOGURU_LEVEL=TRACE rye run pytest
scripts.pytest: nodemon -w tests -w lmtr_agents -e .py -x pytest tests lmtr_agents
scripts.style: nodemon -w lmtr_agents -w tests -x "black tests lmtr_agents && python -m flake8"
scripts.docstyle: nodemon -w lmtr_agents -w tests -x pydocstyle --convention=google tests lmtr_agents
